content.question: For what value of <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does the integral <math alttext="the integral from, 1 to b, of, x squared, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> equal <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, the sum, from k equals 1, to n, of, open parenthesis, 1 plus the fraction 2 k over n, close parenthesis, squared, times the fraction 2 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> could be any real number.
There is no such value of <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
